label: Google Chrome browser extensions
description: Opens a tab in Chrome for every selected extension

groups.label: Essentials
groups.description: Surfing without these is simply not a good idea

planets.label: Adblock
planets.description: Saves bandwith, saves loading time, protects you from virus attacks and makes sure, your eye's won't hurt of big black dongs or flickering raindbow adds. Ohh, also, this one is able to hide Youtube Ads!!!

planets.label: Keep my Pinned Tab
planets.description: Pinned tabs should not just disappear! This saved me so often from accidently closing soundcloud.

planets.label: Empty New Tab Page
planets.description: For minimalists, also hides the most visited websites.

planets.label: Smart QrCode Generator
planets.description: Best think with this QrCode Generator is: It lives within the url bar, so you won't get another extension button which polutes your screen. Why do you need it? Sharing urls to your mobile was never that easy!!

groups.label: Communication
groups.description: Isn't that the reason, most of us use this fancy thing called internet?

planets.label: Cryptocat
planets.description: **Very** secure chatting browser extension. Uses the [OTR cryptographic protocol](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Off-the-Record_Messaging) which is one of the strongest text encryption methods we know so far. Also available for other platforms. Get more details at the [cryptocat website](https://crypto.cat/).

planets.label: Appear.in Screen Sharing
planets.description: If you don't know [appear.in](htts://appear.in): This is an awesome alternative to Skype, Google Hangout etc. No account needed, just share the link with your partner and start video chatting.

planets.label: JSON Formatter
planets.description: Never ever unreadable JSON in your browser again.

planets.label: Terms of Service? Didn't Read!
planets.description: “I have read and agree to the Terms” is the biggest lie on the web. This addon tries to fix it by giving you an overview and a rating for the ToS of the current website.

planets.label: HTTPS Everywhere
planets.description: Simply tries to use encrypted connections to websites when it is possible.

planets.label: Location Guard
planets.description: Location tracking can be nice, this extension helps you to reveal not to detailed position data. Not every websites needs to know where *exactly* you life.

planets.label: Citizen Ex
planets.description: See in which locations you are actually surfing. Pretty interesting.
